data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
Thanks to wxPerl there is an interface to wxWindows for perl.
    wxPerl doesn't cover all of wxWindows classes. This module is the
    implementation of wxMetafile. Since every wxWhatever in C++ is
    rewritten as Wx::Whatever in wxPerl, the name Wx::Metafile only
    seems logical
